Trent Cole finished second in the league in total defeats, defined as the total number of plays by a defensive player that prevents the offense from gaining first-down yardage on third or fourth down, stops the offense behind the line of scrimmage or results in a turnover. Trent Cole had 26 defeats, second to only Justin Tuck . Jason Babin finished third. And Quintin Mikell finished third among safeties with nine run defeats.
